name: WP Filmweb Widget
author: Mateusz Adamus

sections.description:
Shows basic user data from Filmweb.pl portal.
For performance reasons the data is refreshed and parsed once every 6 hours.
sections.installation:
1. Download *.zip file with plugin contents
  2. Extract plugin from the *.zip file
  3. Upload all extracted files and folders to the /wp-content/plugins/wp-filmweb-widget directory
  4. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  5. Enable and configure the widget in the Widgets menu
sections.changelog:
0.5

  • Clear Fastest Cache’s cache (if installed) after widget’s cache refresh

0.4

  • Minor bug fixes

0.2

  • Fixed CSS error causing movie list to overlap other elements of the site
  • Added new options, i.e.: Show Top Rated Movies Label and Show Last Seen Movies Label

0.1

  • Initial release of the plugin
